content.text:
______

                         HON. SCOTT DesJARLAIS

                              of tennessee

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 7, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. DesJARLAIS. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably detained due to a 
medical appointment. Had I been present, I would have voted Yea on Roll 
Call No. 607, and Yea on Roll Call No. 608.
content.speaker: Mr. DesJARLAIS
